title: A Sticky Situation!
description: Begins with the same opening sequence as the series, except that the Professor accidentally adds a can of whoopass rather than Chemical X. The Whoopass Girls fight the Amoeba Boys, get stuck to them, and have to fly them into the sun to beat them.

title: Monkey See, Doggie Do/Mommy Fearest
description: In "Monkey See, Doggie Do", Mojo Jojo swipes some cursed artifacts from the Townsville Museum and using them, turns all of the people of Townsville and then the whole world into dogs. In "Mommy Fearest", the Professor falls for a mysterious woman who grounds the girls and bans them from staying up late to save the day. But it turns out that she is one of their many antagonists, Sedusa.

title: Insect Inside/Powerpuff Bluff
description: "Insect Inside" The city of Townsville becomes overrun by millions of cockroaches, led by their leader Roach Coach. The Powerpuff Girls must fight their fear of bugs in order to save the city.

title: Octi Evil/Geshundfight
description: "Octi-Evil" Him is out to break up the Powerpuff Girls, and uses Bubbles sweetness to do it via Bubbles' stuffed octopus, Octi. "Geshundfight" The amoeba boys try to commit a crime and accidentally get the whole city of Townsville sick.

title: Buttercrush/Fuzzy Logic
description: "Buttercrush" Buttercup develops a crush on Ace, the leader of the Gang Green Gang. They soon take advantage of this to put Blossom and Bubbles into terrible danger.

title: Boogie Frights/Abracadaver
description: In "Boogie Frights", the Boogie Man comes up with a plan to forever keep out light in order to operate freely, but the Powerpuff Girls are on the job in a jiffy. In "Abracadaver", a long-dead resident magician, Al Lusion, comes back to life as a zombie, and the girls have some difficulty in trying to stop him.

title: Telephonies/Tough Love
description: "Telephonies" The Gangreen Gang gets hold of the Powerpuff Girls Hotline and makes crank calls, sending the Girls on a wild goose chase trying to protect the town.

title: Major Competition/Mr. Mojo's Rising
description: "Major Competition" The Powerpuff Girl's place as crime fighters is taken when Major Man comes to town. The PPGs eventually figure out that Major Man is actually faking disasters just so he can "save the day."

title: Paste Makes Waste/Ice Sore
description: In "Paste Makes Waste", one of the Pokey Oaks Kindergarten students has a bad habit of eating glue and Buttercup just can't resist picking on him for this. But when he accidentally eats some radioactive glue and turns into a giant glue monster, it's up to Buttercup to apologize for her behavior toward him to reverse the process. In "Ice Sore", during an intense heat wave, Blossom develops a new superpower, one that makes her sisters jealous, but her schoolmates popular with her: ice breath.

title: Bubblevicious/The Bare Facts
description: Bubbles is tired of being the cute and wants to be "hard-core," but she takes it a little too far.

title: Cat Man Do/Impeach Fuzz
description: "Cat Man Do" The Girls save an innocent little Kitty from the clutches of an evil villain. Eventually they learn that Kitty is the true villain when he hypnotizes the Professor in an evil plot to take over the world.

title: Just Another Manic Mojo/Mime for a Change
description: In "Just Another Manic Mojo", Mojo Jojo's morning routine is disrupted by the Powerpuff Girls when their ball that they are playing with ends up in his lair. Mojo then uses this opportunity to try and eliminate his nemeses for good. In "Mime for a Change", Rainbow the Clown is accidentally transformed by bleach into an evil mime who can eliminate color and sound.

title: The Rowdyruff Boys
description: Mojo Jojo is so outraged at his constant defeats against the Powerpuff Girls that he decides to beat them at their own games, by creating The Rowdyruff Boys, who prove superior fighters to the girls.

title: Uh Oh Dynamo
description: Worried about his little girls' safety, the Professor creates Powerpuff Dynamo, a state-of-the-art protection system.

title: Stuck Up, Up, and Away/Schoolhouse Rocked
description: "Stuck Up, Up, and Away" Bratty little Princess comes to town and wants to be a Powerpuff Girl. When she doesn't get what she wants, the Girls will have to pay.

title: Collect Her/Supper Villain
description: "Collect Her" Lenny Baxter, a rabid fan of Powerpuff Girls memorabilia, collects every bit of Powerpuff stuff available. When he finally has everything, he decides to collect the girls themselves.

title: Birthday Bash/Too Pooped to Puff
description: "Birthday Bash" It's the Girls birthday, and they must deal with destructive gifts from their main enemies: Mojo Jojo, Princess the Amoeba Boys, and Him.

title: Beat Your Greens/Down 'n Dirty
description: "Beat Your Greens" When Broccoli Aliens from space invade Townsville, it's up to the Powerpuff Girls and all the children to take a bite out of crime.

title: Dream Scheme/You Snooze, You Lose
description: "Dream Scheme" The Sandman would like a little rest, so he puts the world to sleep. The Girls must battle him in his dreams to get things back to normal.

title: Slave the Day/Los Dos Mojos
description: "Slave the Day" When the Girls save Big Billy's life, he feels forever in their debt, and becomes their slave. When he begins to get in the way of their crime fighting , they allow him to save their lives so he'll finally leave them alone.

title: A Very Special Blossom/Daylight Savings
description: "A Very Special Blossom" When the Professor wants an expensive gift for Father's Day, Blossom makes the mistake of stealing what she can't afford (Pro-Excellence golf clubs) instead of giving from the heart.

title: Mo Job/Pet Feud
description: "Mo Job" Princess hires Mojo to devise the perfect plan to destroy the Girls, and they are quite shocked when they find that Princess has powers equal to theirs.

title: Imaginary Fiend/Cootie Gras
description: In "Imaginary Fiend", a new kid at school proves so unpopular with his classmates that he conjures up an imaginary friend, who turns out to be quite destructive. In "Cootie Gras", one of Pokey Oaks' students develops the cooties and everyone in school, even the Powerpuff Girls, are avoiding him. Mojo Jojo uses the situation to his advantage.

title: The Powerpuff Girls' Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever/Just Desserts
description: "The Powerpuff Girls Best Rainy Day Adventure Ever" It's raining in Townsville and there is no crime or villainy afoot. So the Girls must stay inside and come up with their very own Powerpuff adventure.

title: Twisted Sister/Cover Up
description: After finding themselves far too tired after a full day of fighting crime, the girls decide to create a new sibling in order to assist them.

title: Speed Demon/Mojo Jonesin
description: "Speed Demon" The Girls accidentally fly the speed of light and when they arrive home, everything has changed. Fifty years have passed and the world has been taken over by Him, since the Girls weren't around to defeat him.

title: Something's a Ms./Slumbering with the Enemy
description: "Something's a Ms." Miss Bellum is acting very strange lately. And she keeps showing up at crime scenes. It turns out that Sedusa is back, has kidnapped Ms. Bellum and has been impersonating her in order to steal money and jewels.

title: Fallen Arches/The Mane Event
description: "Fallen Arches" A gang of old-time villains come out of retirement when they discover the town is being protected by little girls. When the Girls realize that they can't fight their elders, they must enlist the best superhero team of the past to save the city.

title: Town and Out/Child Fearing
description: "Town and Out" When the Professor gets a new job, the Girls have to move to a new town. They try to make the best of it, but it's just not the same. In fact, it's awful.

title: Criss Cross Crisis
description: A failed experiment on the Professor's part causes everyone in Townsville to switch bodies around. Mojo Jojo, also switched, tries to use the situation to his advantage.

title: Bubblevision/Bought and Scold
description: "Bubble Vision" Bubbles fighting has been really terribly lately and the Professor discovers that she needs glasses. Bubbles is humiliated by these huge, horrible things and never wants to see or be seen again.

title: Gettin' Twiggy with It/Cop Out
description: "Gettin' Twiggy With It" Mitch is told to take care of Twiggy, the class hamster for the weekend. But the Girls don't trust him and follow him home. When Mitch flushes Twiggy down the toilet, the Girls are about to attack, but Twiggy emerges bigger and badder than ever.

title: Three Girls and a Monster/Monkey See, Doggie Two
description: "Three Girls and a Monster" The Girls are once again in a furious battle with a ferocious monster. But Blossom and Buttercup can't agree on how to fight the beast and Bubbles just wants everyone to get along.

title: Jewel of the Aisle/Super Zeroes
description: "Jewel of the Aisle" A crook hides a huge diamond in a box of the Girls favorite cereal. He must figure out how to trick the Girls into giving him some cereal and getting the jewel back.

title: Candy Is Dandy/Catastrophe
description: "Candy is Dandy" When the Mayor gives the Girls some candy as a thank you for saving the day, the Girls become hooked on the stuff. They make a deal with a local villain to commit crimes just so they can get their treat.

title: Hot Air Buffoon/Ploys R' Us
description: "Hot Air Buffoon" The Mayor realizes that the Girls are doing all the work in his city for him. So he mans a hot air balloon and starts fighting crime the old fashioned way.

title: The Headsucker's Moxy/Equal Fights
description: "The Headsucker's Moxy" There's a mysterious villain in town who's sucking pertinent information from the brains of powerful people and committing crimes. How do the Girls trap this sucker before his next victim is drained?

title: Powerprof.
description: "Powerprof." The Girls are so busy fighting crime that the Professor doesn't get to see them anymore. He creates a super suit for himself so he can fight crime with them. The Girls are having a great time with their dad until he starts cramping their superhero style. (22 Minutes)

title: Moral Decay/Meet the Beat-Alls
description: "Moral Decay" When Buttercup accidentally knocks out Bubbles' tooth, she learns that tooth decay does pay and soon goes on a spree knocking out teeth and collecting the cash.

title: Helter Shelter/Power Lunch
description: "Helter Shelter" Bubbles has a habit of saving helpless animals and the Professor is sick of it. When Bubbles brings a baby whale home, she and her sisters have a whale of a time hiding this new addition.

title: Film Flam
description: "Film Flam" A sleazy director comes to Townsville ready to make a film about the Girls saving the day in their city. But this Hollywood-type wants more from Townsville than an Oscar winning film. (22 Minutes)

title: All Chalked Up
description: "All Chalked Up" Him tricks Bubbles into bringing her chalk drawings to life, who then reek havoc on Townsville. (22 Minutes)

title: Get Back, Jojo
description: It is Career Day at Pokey Oaks, and the Professor shows to the class a time machine and explains how he got into science and created the Powerpuff Girls. But Mojo Jojo overhears everything and uses the machine to go back in time to that specific time period in order to prevent him from getting into science at all costs. But the Powerpuff Girls also go back in time and are hot on Mojo's trail.

title: Him Diddle Riddle
description: "Him Diddle Riddle" The PPGs must solve a series of riddles by Him to prevent the Professor having to "pay." The entire episode is in real time. (22 Minutes)

title: Members Only
description: "Members Only" When the Girls try to join the all-male superhero organization, they learn that sometimes supermen aren't so super. (22 Minutes)

title: Knock It Off
description: "Knock it Off" When the Professor's college roommate sees his brilliant creations, he decides to cash in on the popularity of the Powerpuffs. (22 Minutes)

title: Superfriends
description: "Super Friends" The new girl next door learns its hard to be best friends with superheroes and soon starts hanging out with the wrong kind of kid-Princess. (22 Minutes)

title: Nano of the North
description: "Nano of the North" It's raining in Townsville, but this is more than just rain. These drops are really microscopic robots tearing apart the city and the Girls must fight with these creatures on their own level. (22 Minutes)

title: Stray Bullet
description: "Stray Bullet" In order to save an innocent squirrel, Bubbles gives him a dash of Chemical X, giving him some super squirrel powers. (22 Minutes)

title: Forced Kin
description: "Forced Kin" A terrible, evil menace from outer space descends upon Townsville. The Girls must fight evil with evil but to do so they seek the advice of ...Mojo Jojo. (22 Minutes)

title: Keen on Keane/Not So Awesome Blossom
description: "Keen on Keane" It's Valentine's Day and the Girls notice that Ms. Keane is all alone. Time for a little matchmaking. But who will the lucky fella be?"

title: Power-Noia
description: "Power-Noia" (22 minutes) The Girls have become paralyzed by their greatest fears. Who could be behind such an evil trick?

title: Monstra-City/Shut the Pup Up
description: "Monstra City" When all the Monsters move from Monster Isle to Townsville it's up to the Girls to keep the peace.

title: Toast of the Town/Divide and Conquer
description: "Toast Of The Town" When the Mayor rubs on Chemical X on his head for hair growth, all of him grows and stomps through Townsville.

title: Burglar Alarmed/Shotgun Wedding
description: "Burglar Alarmed" A new burglar comes to Townsville and his first robbery is at the house of...The Powerpuff Girls?

title: Save Mojo/Substitute Creature
description: "Save Mojo" An animal activist group sets out to protect Mojo, ensuring that he can behave like the naturally evil monkey that he is.

title: The Boys Are Back in Town
description: "The Boys are Back in Town" Him brings the Rowdyruff Boys back, protecting them from the Girls' feminine wiles.

title: Pee Pee G's/Boy Toys
description: "The Pee Pee G's" When the Girls wake up to discover their bed is wet, none want to admit that they are the guilty party.

title: See Me, Feel Me, Gnomey
description: In this musical, the girls are outmatched by Townsville's villains. They turn to Gnomey to bring peace to Townsville in exchange for their powers, but, when the city falls under the rule of Communism, it's up to the girls to stop him.

title: Seed No Evil/City of Clipsville
description: "Seed No Evil" When a prehistoric Caveman thaws out in Townsville, the Girls must stop him from stealing the Mayor's seeds.

title: A Documentary/Girls Gone Mild
description: ."Documentary" A film student attempts to do a documentary on the Powerpuff Girls and learns that catching these superheroes at rest is harder than he thought.

title: Lying Around the House/Bubble Boy
description: "Lying Around the House" The Girls tell little white lies that turn into a big, bad problem.

title: Curses/Bang for Your Buck
description: Bubbles begins to repeat some of the Professor's bad language; The girls compete against the Gangreen Gang to see who can save enough money to buy a destructo ray from Mojo's garage sale.

title: Silent Treatment/Sweet 'n Sour
description: The girls are pulled into a silent movie by an old time villain from the film. The girls have to fight Townsville's newest criminal gang - a group of cuddly little animals.

title: Prime Mates/Coupe d'etat
description: "Prime Mates" Back when Mojo Jojo tried to take over the world with primates, there was one monkey who didn't get his due-Mopey Popo. Now Mopey is back to try and be evil just as Mojo intended.

title: Makes Zen to Me/Say Uncle
description: "Makes Zen to Me" When Buttercup gets a fortune cookie saying that "Peace Lies Within" the most violent of Powerpuffs sets out on a quest for inner peace.

title: Reeking Havoc/Live and Let Dynamo
description: "Reeking Havoc" This year, the Professor's submission for the 2nd Annual Townsville Chili Cookoff is X-tra Special, but this X-tra Special ingredient doesn't settle well with Townsville's tummies.

title: Mo' Linguish/Oops, I Did It Again
description: "Mo' Linguish" Mojo is sentenced to do community service for Townsville and begins teaching English at the Learning Annex. Soon everyone is speaking in circles like Mojo and the town comes to a standstill.

title: A Made Up Story
description: "A Made Up Story" Someone is defacing all the posters and statues of Townsville with make-up. Can the Girls stop this makeover takeover or will they get the blush off?

title: Little Miss Interprets/Night Mayor
description: "Little Miss Interprets" When the Girls hear the Professor trying to make something out of sugar, spice, and everything nice, they are sure he's trying to create new little girls.

title: Custody Battle/City of Nutsville
description: "Custody Battle" Mojo discovers that the Rowdyruff Boys are back and is determined to show them that he is a more evil dad than Him.

title: Aspirations
description: The Gangreen Gang is actually committing brilliant crimes, but, behind every great gang, there has to be a great woman.

title: That's Not My Baby/Simian Says
description: The girls try to prove to the Professor that they are capable of having a pet; Mojo Jojo kidnaps the Narrator to control the Powerpuff Girls' actions on-screen.

title: Sun Scream/City of Frownsville
description: "Sun Scream" The Girls get the ultimate sunburn and must try to fight crime despite their UV damage.

title: West in Pieces
description: "West in Pieces" It's the old west and Mojo the Kid has robbed the first bank ever and forced the sheriff out of town and it is up to the Steamypuff Girls to save the day at a high-noon showdown.

title: Crazy Mixed Up Puffs/Mizzen in Action
description: "Crazy Mixed Up Puffs" The girls must literally work as one to try and stop Mojo from destroying Townsville.

title: Roughing It Up/What's the Big Idea?
description: "Roughing It Up" The Girls and the Professor set on an old-fashioned vacation to the Townsville Swamp. Trouble is, Fuzzy and his nephews are there too.

title: Nuthin' Special/Neighbor Hood
description: "Nuthin Special" Frustrated with not knowing what her Special Power isButtercup Hunts to discover what makes her special.

title: I See a Funny Cartoon in Your Future/Octi Gone
description: "I See a Funny Cartoon in Your Future" The Girls have the rare task of fighting a Medium who is committing petty thefts.
